title: Roku OS 11 takes inspiration from Fire TV and Google TV
content:
Like most of us, Roku had a stressful 2021 and is hoping 2022 might end up better. The company’s first major announcement for this year isn’t a possible new contender for the best media streaming devices, or the rumored Roku-branded smart TVs â€” it’s a new software update for all its existing products. Roku OS

The post Roku OS 11 takes inspiration from Fire TV and Google TV appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Roku OS 11 is now rolling out to supported Roku TVs and boxes, with a few new features we've seen already on Amazon Fire TV and Google TV.
